familyMemberBusinessWithEthicsList.description: Former president/treasurer/secretary of Mar-A-Lago Club, Inc., in which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest. The company reportedly has no independent value or income, and is part of other entity structures.
Former member/president of Mar-A-Lago Club, L.L.C., in which Pres. Trump retains an ownership interest.

conflictDescription: An Israel-focused charity, The Truth About Israel, moved its recent gala event to Pres. Trumps Mar-a-Lago resort in appreciation of the presidents support for Israel.
